Title: Permits the town of Warwick to use preservation funds for water quality improvement, aquatic habitat restoration, pollution prevention, and stormwater collecting system projects
Summary: Permits the town of Warwick to utilize preservation funds for the implementation of water quality improvement projects, aquatic habitat restoration projects, pollution prevention projects, and stormwater collecting systems.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to permitting the town of Warwick to utilize preservation funds for the implementation of water quality improvement projects, aquatic habitat restoration projects, pollution prevention projects, and stormwater collecting systems
